text: Lithang Tulku Tenzin Delek Rinpoche or Tenzing Deleg (1950 â€“ 12 July 2015) was a Tibetan Buddhist leader from Garze, Sichuan. He was born in Lithang, Tibet. He was arrested on April 7, 2002 during a raid on Jamyang Choekhorling in Garze, Sichuan, China. He was accused of being involved in a bomb attack on April 3, 2002 on the central square of Sichuan's provincial capital, Chengdu.Tenzin Deleg Rinpoche ? Tibetan Monk IGFM He was sentenced to life imprisonment. He died in prison in Chengdu. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Buddhists Category:People who died in prison custody Category:Tibetan people
title: Tenzin Delek Rinpoche
